Member Function Documentation

virtual void DataspaceUnit::convertToNeutral ( long  inputNumArgs,
t_atom *  inputAtoms,
long *  outputNumArgs,
double *  output 
) [pure virtual]

Converts from an actual unit to a 'neutral' unit that can be interpreted by other units within this dataspace.

This must be defined by a sub-class.

Implemented in RadianUnit, DegreeUnit, CMYUnit, HSLUnit, HSVUnit, RGBUnit, CentimeterUnit, InchUnit, FootUnit, MeterUnit, LinearAmplitudeUnit, MidiGainUnit, DecibelUnit, NoneUnit, MidiPitchUnit, FrequencyUnit, Cartesian3DUnit, Cartesian2DUnit, SphericalUnit, PolarUnit, OpenGlUnit, CylindricalUnit, CelsiusUnit, FahrenheitUnit, KelvinUnit, MillisecondUnit, SampleUnit, and SecondUnit.

Referenced by DataspaceLib::convert().

double *  input,
long *  outputNumArgs,
t_atom **  outputAtoms 
) [pure virtual]

Converts from a neutral unit back to an actual unit.

This must be defined by a sub-class.

Implemented in RadianUnit, DegreeUnit, CMYUnit, HSLUnit, HSVUnit, RGBUnit, CentimeterUnit, InchUnit, FootUnit, MeterUnit, LinearAmplitudeUnit, MidiGainUnit, DecibelUnit, NoneUnit, MidiPitchUnit, FrequencyUnit, Cartesian3DUnit, Cartesian2DUnit, SphericalUnit, PolarUnit, OpenGlUnit, CylindricalUnit, CelsiusUnit, FahrenheitUnit, KelvinUnit, MillisecondUnit, SampleUnit, and SecondUnit.
